content.subtitle: Fun in the Sun
content.body:
As always, all humans are always welcome (21 and over), and as stated on our membership page, you do not need a dog to come into the bar!

There are no restrictions on who can attend this year's event, so if you haven't visited us yet, our Ski to Sea event will be an excellent time to come down and get to know us and our friends. Check out the membership and rules pages to learn about how we operate to make sure you and your furry friend(s) have a great time.

content.title: Live Music: Funnybone & The Fleas
content.body: Live music is lined up with Funnybone & The Fleas! Includes members of Bigfoot Zoo, Snug Harbor, The Staxx Brothers, and The Billy Crystal. The show will go from approximately 2-5 pm.

content.title: Food Truck: Goat Mountain Kid Sister
content.body: Goat Mountain's Kid Sister food truck will be on-site should you need something tasty and filling to go along with your delicious, cold NW beverages. They provide scratch made tacos, burritos and other items for your enjoyment!
